name: Rust For Custom Maps
author: nobbassen@gmail.com
description: Compatible with Custom maps: The only aim in Rust is to survive. To do this you will need to overcome struggles such as hunger, thirst and cold. Build a fire. Build a shelter. Kill animals for meat. Protect yourself from other players, and kill them for meat. Create alliances with other players and form a town. Do whatever it takes to survive.

installation.script:
apt update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl unzip lib32gcc1 ca-certificates
cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz http://media.steampowered.com/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz

mkdir -p /mnt/server/steam
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steam
cd /mnt/server/steam
chown -R root:root /mnt

export HOME=/mnt/server
./steamcmd.sh +login anonymous +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update 258550 +quit
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v /mnt/server/steam/linux32/steamclient.so /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

variables.name: Server Name
variables.description: The name of your server in the public server list.

variables.name: uMod (OxideMod)
variables.description: Set whether you want the server to use and auto update uMod (OxideMod) or not. Valid options are "1" for true and "0" for false.

variables.name: Description
variables.description: The description under your server title. Commonly used for rules & info. Use \n for newlines.
variables.default_value: Awesome Server! More info bellow this line\nThis is the new line

variables.name: URL
variables.description: The URL for your server. This is what comes up when clicking the "Visit Website" button.

variables.name: Max Players
variables.description: The maximum amount of players allowed in the server at once.

variables.name: Server Image
variables.description:
The header image for the top of your server listing. 

- Width: 1024 px Height: 512 px
- File Type: .jpg, .png
- The file must be hosted in a publicly accessible web location (Dropbox, Imgur, etc)

variables.name: RCON Port
variables.description:
Port for RCON connections.
ProTip If you are using Pterodactyl, Pterodactyl can only assign one active port at any time. set the port to the same as your game port and connect using that very same port from your Rcon tool.

variables.name: Save Interval
variables.description: Sets the server’s auto-save interval in seconds.

variables.name: Additional Arguments
variables.description: Add additional startup parameters to the server. Leave the default first time you start server as this is required by most plugins before you can run your own .map file.

variables.name: Custom Map URL
variables.description: Provide a public link from where the server can pull your custom .map file
